Slope One: Slope one is an algorithm used for recommender systems. Slope one is arguably the simplest form of non-trivial item-based collaborative filtering based on ratings.

Complexity.time: m*n^2 (where m is the number of users and n is the number of items)

References: A Programmer's Guide to Data Mining (ch 3) that explains Slope One

files.datamining: Slope one using data from the example in A Programmer's Guide to Data Mining
